channel.title: Special attacks
channel.description:
Does anyone know of a server that has working specials? or even just one weapon special?
I'd like a server with a dds special, If anyone knows of any could they please post a download link.
Also, When you attack an npc/player is there a way to make them face each other? And where can I fix the problem of when you pick up an item (say shark) and theres say 20 on the ground and you pick one up and all 20 disappear, I'd like it to be normal, so you can get all 20.
thanks

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Does anyone know of a server that has working specials? or even just one weapon special?

I’d like a server with a dds special, If anyone knows of any could they please post a download link.

Also, When you attack an npc/player is there a way to make them face each other?
And where can I fix the problem of when you pick up an item (say shark) and theres say 20 on the ground
and you pick one up and all 20 disappear, I’d like it to be normal, so you can get all 20.

thanks
